item.title: Funding Widget
item.description: The funding widget, AKA buy me a coffee widget, gives the readers a way to support a creator.

item.title: Reward Widget
item.description:
The reward widget, AKA buy me a coffee widget, gives the readers a way to support a creator through the use of donations or tips.

However, it limited to the QR code image, please take a look at the funding widget.
